title: go1.2rc3.windows-386 - unable to cross compile to linux 386
body:
by **tarqe39**: 
There seems to be the problem with cross compilation that results in "ld.exe has
stopped working" error.
Steps in comman prompt are as follows:
set GOARCH=386
set GOOS=linux
Make.bat --no-clean

error message:

cmd/gc
cmd/8l
collect2: ld returned 5 exit status
go tool dist: FAILED: gcc -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -Wextra -Wunused -Wuninitial
ized -Wno-sign-compare -Wno-missing-braces -Wno-parentheses -Wno-unknown-pragmas
 -Wno-switch -Wno-comment -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Werror -fno-common -g
gdb -pipe -O2 -o c:\Go\pkg\tool\windows_386\8l.exe -m32 C:\Users\tarqe\AppData\L
ocal\Temp\goEE90.tmp\data.o C:\Users\tarqe\AppData\Local\Temp\goEE90.tmp\decodes
ym.o C:\Users\tarqe\AppData\Local\Temp\goEE90.tmp\dwarf.o C:\Users\tarqe\AppData
\Local\Temp\goEE90.tmp\elf.o C:\Users\tarqe\AppData\Local\Temp\goEE90.tmp\go.o C
:\Users\tarqe\AppData\Local\Temp\goEE90.tmp\ldelf.o C:\Users\tarqe\AppData\Local
\Temp\goEE90.tmp\ldmacho.o C:\Users\tarqe\AppData\Local\Temp\goEE90.tmp\ldpe.o C
:\Users\tarqe\AppData\Local\Temp\goEE90.tmp\lib.o C:\Users\tarqe\AppData\Local\T
emp\goEE90.tmp\macho.o C:\Users\tarqe\AppData\Local\Temp\goEE90.tmp\pe.o C:\User
s\tarqe\AppData\Local\Temp\goEE90.tmp\symtab.o C:\Users\tarqe\AppData\Local\Temp
\goEE90.tmp\asm.o C:\Users\tarqe\AppData\Local\Temp\goEE90.tmp\enam.o C:\User
